title: Anyone know this logo?
tags: Need more information about this logo.
content:
I need information about the right side logo. If you can give clear image it will be best!!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108154456im_/http:/typophile.com/files/108116-Corvettes_6531.jpg)
author: artslons

comments.content:
It reminds me of Florence's coat of arms:  
 [http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:FlorenceCoA.svg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108154456/http:/it.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:FlorenceCoA.svg "http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:FlorenceCoA.svg")

And of the Fleur-de-lis:  
 [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fleur-de-lis](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108154456/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fleur-de-lis "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fleur-de-lis")
Well that is a "fleur de lys", the part on the left reminds me of the Chevrolet logo.
Ah, it is part of the Corvette logo.
